skill.description:
Transform into a Lumiscale Construct and enter a Parry Stance. If the Parry Stance finishes without being attacked, slash to deal {0} Glacio DMG. Otherwise, perform a Counterattack immediately, dealing {1} Glacio DMG. If the attack received is a <color=Highlight>Special Skill</color> attack, interrupt the enemy's <color=Highlight>Special Skill</color> and perform a Counterattack, dealing {1} Glacio DMG.

CD: {2}s
